meanings.sent1: The street was awash with rainwater after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The basement was awash with water after the pipe burst.
meanings.sent3: The picnic area was awash with unexpected rain, turning the gathering into a water party.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were awash with conflicting feelings as she tried to make a decision.
meanings.sent5: The garden was awash with colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: The shelves were awash with books of all genres.
meanings.sent2: The room was awash with laughter during the family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was awash with excitement as the students prepared for the surprise quiz.
meanings.sent4: His mind was awash with memories of their time together.
meanings.sent5: The market was awash with fresh produce, enticing shoppers with its variety.

meanings.definition: Floating or drifting on the water
meanings.sent1: The boat was awash with colorful flags for the festival.
meanings.sent2: The lake was awash with fallen leaves in the autumn.
meanings.sent3: The pool was awash with inflatable toys, making it look like a fun playground.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were awash with dreams of sailing to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The ocean was awash with sunlight, creating a sparkling reflection on the waves.
